title: Strictly viewers call for Shirley Ballas to be sacked after controversial decision

Strictly Come Dancing viewers were furious at judge Shirley Ballas in Sunday night's show.

Mike Bushell and Katya Jones went head to head against Catherine Tyldesley and Johannes Radebe in the dance off.

Craig Revel Horwood voted for Mike and Katya, while Motsi Mabuse and Bruno Tonioli chose to save Catherine and Johannes.

She opted to save Mike Bushell and Katya Jones, sending home Catherine Tyldesley and Johannes Radebe.

This decision was slammed by viewers who were convinced she made the wrong decision.

(Image: BBC)

(Image: BBC)

"Was Shirley watching the same programme as the rest of us?", questioned one viewer.

"She saved Mike!! Terrible decision".

Another wrote: " Strictly that was a very strange decision made by Shirley Ballas tonight. Cath and Johannes were by far the better dancers."

"What the hell! Wrong decision Shirley - why on earth did you keep Mike???", exclaimed another.

(Image: BBC)

Some even called for Shirley to be sacked

"Can they sack Shirley for making a stupid decision. MOTSI FOR HEAD JUDGE", demanded a furious viewer.

"Disgusted Shirley has again made a vicious decision. Get rid of her. The BBC need to sack her", said another.

Other tweets included: "I an incandescent with rage. Sack Shirley", and "Sack Shirley should be trending. she is a dance expert , my backside. #sackshirley ".

(Image: BBC)

Last week's result also caused a massive backlash when radio presenter Dev Griffin was sent home.

pppearing on the Jonathan Ross show, Shirley even revealed she was sent death threats.

Detailing some of the worst trolling she's received, Shirley revealed: "Somebody put a picture with my face on it digging my own grave [with a comment] 'Die b***h' and put me on a chicken spit."
description: Shirley Ballas' decision on who to send home in Sunday's Strictly Come Dancing had viewers raging
